title: Bill Evans trio YOU MUST BELIEVE IN SPRING (1977)
description:
Released posthumously this recording was Bill Evans first with Warner Bros

and last with long time bassist Eddie Gomez (11 years)



It was the home stretch for Bill but musically he kept growing.  He was the most

influential jazz pianist of his generation IMO


2 years later track #4 WE WILL MEET AGAIN; a tune dedicated to Bill's late

brother Harry Evans, became the title track of my favorite Bill Evans album:

Bill Evans quintet  WE WILL MEET AGAIN  with trumpeter Tom Harrell


I uploaded that one as anonymous in uncompressed .WAV files and continue to seed 

it's bloated 625 MB  (0812)
